name: com.m039.basic-localization
description:
The Basic Localization package allows you easily and quickly translate your project to another language.

This package is well suited for quick prototypes and jam games, but it is also tested for large amount of data.

Basic Localization also uses intuitive UI for managing all translations.

samples.description: This sample contains a scene with hello in different languages. The sample is self contained.
This sample contains a scene with hello in different languages. The sample is self contained and uses TextMeshPro.
